numbered_ace_sentences: 1. For most countries, the older generation has a lower percentage of people who think that the world is getting better.
2. For most countries, the younger generation has a higher percentage of people who think that the world is getting better.
3. In the US, the younger generation has a much higher percentage of people who think that the world is getting better.
4. Only 3 countries have 40-year-olds who think that the world is getting better.
5. I wonder what it means that the world is getting better.
6. I wonder in what ways the world is getting better.
7. I wonder why they did not collect data from the 25-40 age group.
8. This relates to me and my community.
9. I am part of the younger generation.
10. The headline is: Whose More Optimistic?
